# Low-cost courses for college credit

## Earn college-level credit quickly and affordably

With Sophia’s on-demand, self-paced format, you can complete your courses on your schedule, at your pace. Sophia courses are available anytime, anywhere, and most can be accessed from any device.

## Discover courses

### Start your free trial today

- Take the first Challenge of any course
- Go at your own pace
- Access anytime, anywhere

Enter email

Sign up

## Earn college-level credit without breaking the bank

Make quick work of your gen ed courses with Sophia’s self-paced, on-demand format. Our learning coaches are here to support you every step of the way. Connect with them by phone, email or online chat.

![icon](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/icons/SHD_transfer.svg)

Apply credits toward your degree

![icon](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/icons/SHD_fast-signup.svg)

Start today with a free trial

![icon](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/icons/SHD_affordable.svg)

Just $99 a month — no additional fees

![icon](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/icons/SHD_flexible.svg)

Go at your own pace — anytime, anywhere

![icon](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/icons/SHD_no-hidden-fees.svg)

Enjoy a low-cost monthly membership

![icon](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/icons/SHD_student-support.svg)

Get help from Sophia’s Learning Coaches

“

**Sophia has nailed down an engaging online teaching method that I managed to pass 100%, the site is pleasant to look at, the material is vastly more in-depth and challenging and their method makes it impossible not to learn.**

Michaela L.

Partner university student

## An ACE® recommended learning pathway

Sophia’s ACE® and DEAC-recommended courses have been reviewed for credit at 1,000+ colleges and universities. The American Council on Education Learning Evaluations (ACE®) has evaluated and recommended college credit for over 70 of Sophia's online courses.

[![American Council on Education logo](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/logos/Near-Footer_ACE_Logo.svg)](https://www.acenet.edu/Pages/default.aspx)

[![Distance Education Accreditation Commission logo](https://www.sophia.org/content/dam/sophia/logos/Near-Footer_DEAC_Logo.svg)](https://www.deac.org/)
